TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Condition extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize
Public NotInheritable Class Condition Implements ISupportInitialize
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Condition extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 和 的条件，它们两个将根据一组条件对属性值应用更改。

span.span: Represents a condition for the and the , which apply changes to property values based on a set of conditions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 允许您根据一组条件设置属性值。s and s allow you to set property values based on a set of conditions. 如果元素或数据项的属性值与指定 (引用相等性检查) 匹配，则满足条件。A condition is satisfied when the property value of the element or data item matches the specified (reference equality check). 如果满足所有指定的条件，则应用触发器。If all specified conditions are satisfied, then the trigger is applied. 下面列出了将导致异常的事例：The following is a list of cases that will cause an exception: - 对于每个 ，只能设置 属性或 属性。For each , you can only set either the property or the property. 如果同时设置了这两个属性，则会引发异常。If both properties are set, an exception is thrown. - 如果 为 ，则 属性不能为 null。If the is for a , the property cannot be null. - 如果 为 ，则 属性不能为 null。If the is for a , the property cannot be null. - 如果指定的对于指定的类型无效，则会引发异常 。An exception is thrown if the specified is not valid for the type of the specified . 请注意，如果为 ，则 必须设置和属性。Note that if the is for a , the and properties must be set. 如果它用于，则 必须设置和属性。If it is for a , the and properties must be set. ## Examples 下面的示例包含两个 。The following example contains two s. 如果**HasItems**属性为 False 且**Width**属性为**Auto**，则第一个设置**MinWidth**属性值。第二个是类似的，但适用于**MinHeight**属性。The first sets the **MinWidth** property value when the **HasItems** property is false and the **Width** property is **Auto**. The second one is similar but is for the **MinHeight** property. [!code-xaml[ControlTemplateExamples_snip#MultiTriggerExample1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlTemplateExamples_snip/CS/Page1.xaml#multitriggerexample1)] 有关中使用的条件的示例，请参见属性 。See the property for examples of conditions used in a .

summary.span: 获取或设置指定条件属性的绑定。

span.span: Gets or sets the binding that specifies the property of the condition.
This is only applicable to objects.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks s 允许您基于返回的数据的值设置属性值。s allow you to set property values based on values of the data that is returned. 例如，如果您正在显示任务项列表，则您可能希望显示具有红色背景的任务（如果该任务的优先级较高并且尚未查看两周以上）。For example, if you are displaying a list of task items, you may want to display a task with a red background if it is of high priority and has not been looked at for more than two weeks. 您将创建一个绑定，并使用 属性绑定到 (绑定源对象) 的特定对象的属性。You create a binding and use the property to bind to a property of a certain object (the binding source object). 例如，可以绑定到*任务*的*Priority*属性。For example, you may bind to the *Priority* property of a *Task*. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据绑定概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview)。For more information, see [Data Binding Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview). 请注意，如果它是的条件 ，则 必须设置和属性。Note that if it is a condition for a , the and properties must be set. 在这种情况下，设置值会导致异常。Setting the value would cause an exception in that case. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *声明**declaration* 绑定声明。A binding declaration. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [绑定声明概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview) 。See [Binding Declarations Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/data/binding-declarations-overview) for more information. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，的将 绑定到 *位置*，即 *位置* 对象。In the following example, the of the is bound to *Places*, an of *Place* objects. *放置* 对象具有属性 *名称* 和 *状态*。*Place* objects have properties *Name* and *State*. 每个都 显示一个 *位置* 对象。Each of the displays a *Place* object. 示例中的将应用于每个 。The in the example is applied to each . 指定的是， 如果*位置*数据项的*名称*和*状态*分别为 "带" 和 "OR"，则相应的背景 设置为 "青色"。The s of the are specified such that if the *Name* and *State* of the *Place* data item is "Portland" and "OR" respectively, then the background of corresponding is set to Cyan. [!code-xaml[DataTrigger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DataTrigger/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置条件的属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the property of the condition.
This is only applicable to objects.
A that specifies the property of the condition.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks s 允许您根据一组条件设置属性值。s allow you to set property values based on a set of conditions. 如果元素的属性) 指定的 (属性的值 与指定的 (引用相等性检查) 匹配，则满足条件。A condition is satisfied when the value of the property (specified by the property) of the element matches the specified (reference equality check). 如果满足所有指定的条件，则应用触发器。If all specified conditions are satisfied, then the trigger is applied. 如果 `TargetType` 未在包含触发器的模板的样式上设置，则为。If `TargetType` is not set on the style of the template that contains the triggers. 然后，需要使用语法来限定属性名称 `ClassName.PropertyName` 。Then you need to qualify the property name using the `ClassName.PropertyName` syntax. 请注意，如果它是的条件 ，则 必须设置和属性。Note that if it is a condition for a , the and properties must be set. 在这种情况下，设置值会导致异常。Setting the value would cause an exception in that case. 对于 s 中的 ， 应使用属性，而不是使用此属性。For s in s, the property should be used instead of this property. ## Examples 下面的示例包含两个 。The following example contains two s. 如果**HasItems**属性为 False 且**Width**属性为**Auto**，则第一个设置**MinWidth**属性值。第二个是类似的，但适用于**MinHeight**属性。The first sets the **MinWidth** property value when the **HasItems** property is false and the **Width** property is **Auto**. The second one is similar but is for the **MinHeight** property. [!code-xaml[ControlTemplateExamples_snip#MultiTriggerExample1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlTemplateExamples_snip/CS/Page1.xaml#multitriggerexample1)]

summary.span: 处理标记扩展为 对象的属性提供值的情况。

span.span: Handles cases where a markup extension provides a value for a property of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是在类级别应用的特性所引用的方法 ，这意味着此方法将处理所有使用标记扩展来设置值的尝试 。This is the method referenced by an applied attribute at the class level, which means that this method processes all attempts to set values of with a markup extension. 通常不直接调用此方法。You do not typically call this method directly.

summary.span: 获取或设置对象的名称，该对象具有可应用关联的 setter 的属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the object with the property that causes the associated setters to be applied.
This is only applicable to objects.
The default property is .

value.span: 如果此属性为 ，则正在进行样式设置的对象的属性会导致应用关联的 setter。

span.span: If this property is , then the property of the object being styled causes the associated setters to be applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以将此属性设置为应用于包含此条件的触发器) 所属的集合 (集合中的任何元素的名称。You can set this property to the name of any element within the scope of where the trigger collection (the collection that the trigger that contains this condition is part of) is applied. 这通常是包含触发器的模板中的命名元素。This is typically a named element that is within the template that contains the trigger. 可以使用 [X：Name 指令](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive) 语法来命名对象。You can name an object using the [x:Name Directive](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive) syntax.

exception.span: 使用 之后，就不能再对其进行修改。

span.span: After a is in use, it cannot be modified.
